method.name: PUT
method.doc: To unconfigure an authorization server instance using the supplied parameters and the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the authorization server resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: admin_id
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator name. This parameter is optional and will be set to sec_master if not specified.

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator password.

param.name: operation
param.doc: A flag that is used to indicate the operation to perform. Accepted value is "unconfigure".

param.name: force
param.doc: Whether or not to force the unconfiguration of the instance in the event the policy server is unreachable. Accepted values are yes or no. This parameter is optional and will default to no if not specified.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
